data.value: Snipe a Window on all connected Monitors (May be slower)

data.value: Use .JPEG for Images (Faster uploads, lower Quality)

data.value: Use .PNG for Images (Slower uploads, higher Quality)

data.value: An ImgurSniper Update is available to download! (v{0}/{1})

data.value: Could not download ZIP Archive from github.com!

data.name: failedUpdate
data.value: Could not retrieve Version/Update info from GitHub!

data.name: disablingTrayWarning
data.value: Are you sure you want to disable the ImgurSniper Tray Service?

data.name: langChanged
data.value: Language successfully changed, to proceed, you have to restart ImgurSniper. Do you want to restart ImgurSniper now?

data.name: plsPin
data.value: Please enter the PIN you received on the Website.

data.name: wrongPin
data.value: Wrong PIN? Could not login to Imgur! ({0})

data.name: pageClipboardDesc
data.value: As soon as you have finished cropping the desired Rectangle, ImgurSniper will automatically copy the URL to Imgur or the whole Image itself (depending on your Settings) to your Clipboard, so you're ready to send it immediately!

data.name: pageDrawDesc
data.value: In Snipe Mode, you can draw on your screen to show the receiver something important (Circle, Arrows, ...), hide some Information, or show your drawing Skills! To enter the drawing Mode, you just need to press Space once in Snap Mode!

data.name: pageGeneralDesc
data.value:
ImgurSniper is an easy to use, fast and simple tool to help you share Images better. Open ImgurSniper with your Hotkey (default: Ctrl + Shift + X) and Crop an Image, or right click an Image File and click "Upload to Imgur" to upload the Image. See "Snipe" and "Tray" for more Information about the Program.
Licensed under MIT Open Source License on github.com/mrousavy/ImgurSniper, you can modify the Program for your needs. To contribute, click the Fork button (top right) on GitHub, customize your Project, and create a Pull Request.

data.name: pagePrivacyDesc
data.value: ImgurSniper does not collect any data, the only Information being uploaded is your Image. (The Image itself is private, and only accessible for users with the link.) As the ImgurSniper C# Project is on GitHub, you can easily view 100% of the Code. ImgurSniper uses OAuth2.0 for Authentication, so no Password or username will be stored, and you can revoke access anytime.

data.name: pageRightClickDesc
data.value: When you Right Click with your Mouse in Snipe Mode, ImgurSniper will detect the Window you clicked, and upload the cropped Image of that Window to Imgur. ImgurSniper does detect a whole Window when you click the Titlebar and even Client Area(s) (Areas inside a Window).

data.name: pageSnipeDesc
data.value: Press your Hotkey (default: Ctrl + Shift + X) to open ImgurSniper in Snipe mode. In Snipe Mode, you can hold down your mouse and draw a Rectangle to select the Area you want to upload. Once you release the mouse, the Image will automatically be uploaded to Imgur (if enabled), saved as a file (optionally), and the Link (or Image itself) will be copied to your Clipboard. Depending on your Settings, the Image will be automatically opened for you to see aswell. Pro Tip: Hit Ctrl + A to instantly create a Screenshot of your whole Desktop.

data.name: pageTrayDesc
data.value: The Tray Service is running in the Background, so you can activate ImgurSniper with your Hotkey (default: Ctrl + Shift + X) way faster than launching the executable. The Tray Service is optimized to use as little processing power as possible, so your PC is definetly not slowed down. You can find the ImgurSniper Tray Program in the bottom right corner of your Screen, Right Click the Icon to open the Menu.

data.name: contextMenuDesc
data.value: Right click any File in Windows Explorer (or on your Desktop) to open the Context Menu. To quickly upload any File to Imgur, you can now click "Upload to Imgur"

data.name: troubleshootingTips
data.value: Oh no! It looks like you encountered an Error while uploading an Image. If this problem occurs more often, try the following: • Try logging in with your Imgur Account • Change the Image Format from .PNG to .JPEG • Restart your Computer • Make sure that you have Write Permissions to Documents/ImgurSniper • Make sure that your GIF is not too long, too big, or has too many FPS! Does the Error still occur? Maybe your Internet Connection is too slow for the Imgur Service.

data.name: pageGifDesc
data.value:
To snipe a new GIF you have to press your GIF Hotkey (Default: Ctrl + Shift + G) or right-click the ImgurSniper Tray Icon (right side of your Taskbar) and hit "GIF". Instead of sharing a single Image, you now can share a short Screen Recording!
As soon as you selected your desired area, ImgurSniper will start recording the GIF. The blue Progress Bar below the grey Area will show you the Progress of the GIF (Once the Progress Bar is full, the screen recording will automatically stop and begin uploading the GIF.) To stop recording manually, you have to click the blue Check Button right next to the Progress Bar. Your GIF is then being uploaded to Imgur.

data.name: unhandledErrorDescription
data.value:
An unknown Error occured in ImgurSniper. Error Message: "{0}"
Do you want to restart ImgurSniper?

data.name: unhandledError
data.value: Oh no! Sorry about that, it seems like ImgurSniper ran into an unexpected Error! But no worries, you can help out and get this Problem fixed asap! Do you want to help out and submit a ticket? (If you click yes, a new Browser Window opens)

data.name: wantToApply
data.value: Do you want to apply the changes you made?

data.name: trayServiceStartFail
data.value: Could not start ImgurSniper tray service!

data.name: openFile
data.value: Open Image in File Explorer after Snap

data.name: freezeScreenTooltip
data.value: Use this option if you want to pause the screen as soon as you open up ImgurSniper, e.g. for screenshotting elements that disappear once you open ImgurSniper.
